statements: SELECT * FROM FoodNutritionalInfo;
SELECT food_name, calories, protein_g FROM FoodNutritionalInfo WHERE calories > 100;
SELECT food_name, carbs_g, fats_g FROM FoodNutritionalInfo WHERE protein_g >= 5 ORDER BY fats_g DESC;
SELECT food_name, calories FROM FoodNutritionalInfo WHERE carbs_g < 20 AND fats_g < 10 ORDER BY calories ASC;
SELECT food_id, food_name, protein_g, fats_g FROM FoodNutritionalInfo WHERE carbs_g BETWEEN 10 AND 30 ORDER BY protein_g DESC, fats_g ASC;
SELECT * FROM FoodNutritionalInfo ORDER BY calories DESC, protein_g ASC, fats_g DESC;
SELECT food_name, protein_g FROM FoodNutritionalInfo WHERE carbs_g < 50 ORDER BY protein_g DESC;
SELECT food_name, calories, protein_g FROM FoodNutritionalInfo WHERE calories < 200 AND protein_g > 10;
SELECT food_name, carbs_g FROM FoodNutritionalInfo WHERE fats_g < 5 ORDER BY food_name ASC;
SELECT food_name, protein_g, fats_g FROM FoodNutritionalInfo WHERE calories > 300 ORDER BY fats_g DESC, protein_g ASC;
SELECT * FROM food_items;
SELECT id, name, calories FROM food_items ORDER BY calories DESC;
SELECT id, name, protein, carbohydrates, fats FROM food_items WHERE protein > 5;
SELECT name, serving_name, serving_size, measurement_unit FROM food_items JOIN serving_size ON food_items.id = serving_size.food_item_id;
SELECT id, name, serving_name, serving_size, measurement_unit FROM food_items LEFT JOIN serving_size ON food_items.id = serving_size.food_item_id WHERE fats < 10;
SELECT id, name, calories, protein, carbohydrates, fats FROM food_items;
SELECT name, calories, protein FROM food_items WHERE calories > 100;
SELECT * FROM serving_size WHERE serving_size > 5 ORDER BY serving_size DESC;
SELECT name, calories, protein, carbohydrates, fats FROM food_items JOIN serving_size ON food_items.id = serving_size.food_item_id;
SELECT id, name, calories, protein, carbohydrates, fats FROM food_items WHERE protein > 20 ORDER BY calories DESC;
SELECT * FROM food_items;
SELECT name, calories, protein FROM food_items WHERE calories >= 500;
SELECT id, name, category FROM food_items JOIN food_categories ON food_items.id = food_categories.id;
SELECT * FROM food_nutrients WHERE nutrient_type = 'Vitamin C';
SELECT name, calories, fat FROM food_items WHERE fat <= 5;
SELECT * FROM food_items WHERE calories > 200 ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT name, calories FROM food_items WHERE carbohydrates < 50 ORDER BY calories ASC
SELECT f.name, fn.nutrient_type, fn.value FROM food_items f JOIN food_nutrients fn ON f.id = fn.food_id WHERE fn.nutrient_type = 'protein' ORDER BY fn.value DESC
SELECT fc.category, COUNT(fi.id) AS total_items FROM food_categories fc LEFT JOIN food_items fi ON fc.id = fi.id GROUP BY fc.category ORDER BY total_items DESC
SELECT f.name, SUM(fn.value) AS total_protein FROM food_items f JOIN food_nutrients fn ON f.id = fn.food_id WHERE fn.nutrient_type = 'protein' GROUP BY f.name HAVING total_protein > 50
SELECT * FROM FoodItems;
SELECT food_name, calories FROM FoodItems WHERE calories > 200;
SELECT food_name, protein, carbs FROM FoodItems ORDER BY protein DESC;
SELECT food_name, fat FROM FoodItems WHERE fat < 5 ORDER BY fat ASC;
SELECT recipe_name, instructions FROM FoodRecipes;
SELECT food_id, food_name, calories FROM FoodItems WHERE protein > 15 ORDER BY calories DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) FROM FoodCategories JOIN FoodRecipes ON FoodCategories.category_id = FoodRecipes.recipe_id GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT * FROM FoodItems WHERE food_name ILIKE '%chicken%' AND (protein > 20 OR fat < 5);
SELECT user_id, COUNT(food_id) as favorite_count FROM UserFavorites GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(food_id) > 3;
SELECT recipe_name, instructions FROM FoodRecipes WHERE LENGTH(instructions) > 100 ORDER BY RANDOM() LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM FoodItems;
SELECT name, calories, protein, carbohydrates, fats FROM FoodItems WHERE calories > 200;
SELECT id, category_name FROM FoodCategories ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, calories_per_unit, protein_per_unit FROM Ingredients WHERE carbohydrates_per_unit < 10;
SELECT plan_name FROM MealPlan WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) AND plan_name LIKE 'Vegetarian%';
SELECT * FROM FoodItems WHERE calories > 200 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, protein FROM FoodItems WHERE category_id = 3 ORDER BY protein DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Ingredients WHERE fats_per_unit < 5;
SELECT plan_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM MealPlan JOIN MealItems ON MealPlan.id = MealItems.meal_id GROUP BY plan_name HAVING total_quantity > 10;
SELECT category_name, AVG(calories) AS avg_calories FROM FoodCategories JOIN FoodItems ON FoodCategories.id = FoodItems.category_id GROUP BY category_name ORDER BY avg_calories DESC;
